results.title: Review Dependabot npm PRs for docs/package.json bundle
results.author: Copilot
results.action_explanation: Low-priority infrastructure documentation in draft status. Wait for author to mark ready for review and CI to pass before further action.
results.impact_rationale: Documentation + shell script for Dependabot review process. Infrastructure work, non-critical.
results.urgency_rationale: 9.2 hours old, still in draft. No immediate urgency. CI pending.
results.quality_rationale: Good description with detailed analysis. CI pending. Draft status reduces quality score.

results.title: Simplify dependabot manager instructions to 3 bullet points
results.author: Copilot
results.action_explanation: Medium-risk refactor with good quality. Part of batch-workflow-improvements group with similar workflow simplification changes.
results.impact_rationale: Simplifies workflow instructions significantly (86% reduction). Improves maintainability but changes agent behavior.
results.urgency_rationale: Very recent (0.7 hours). Ready for review (not draft). CI unstable. Has review comment requiring attention.
results.quality_rationale: Excellent description explaining rationale. One review comment needs addressing. Not draft shows confidence.

results.title: Refactor: Extract duplicate expired entity cleanup orchestration
results.author: Copilot
results.action_explanation: High-quality refactor addressing code duplication. Groups with PR #14289 for batch workflow/code improvements review.
results.impact_rationale: Eliminates 234 duplicate lines across 3 entity cleanup scripts. Significant maintainability improvement.
results.urgency_rationale: Very recent (0.5 hours). Addresses technical debt identified by automated analysis. CI unstable.
results.quality_rationale: Excellent description with before/after examples. Comprehensive test coverage added. Still in draft.

results.title: Fix update-project to deduplicate draft issues by title
results.author: Copilot
results.action_explanation: Important bug fix for project management functionality. Medium priority with good quality. Should be reviewed promptly once CI passes.
results.impact_rationale: Fixes duplicate draft issue creation bug in project management. Affects workflow reliability.
results.urgency_rationale: Recent bug fix (0.5 hours). Prevents duplicate items on project boards. CI unstable.
results.quality_rationale: Clear bug description with root cause analysis. Test coverage included. Still in draft.

results.title: Analysis: ProjectOps + Orchestration pain points with minimal architectural solutions
results.author: Copilot
results.action_explanation: High-quality analysis documentation that requires thorough review but no immediate implementation. Can be reviewed when stakeholders have time for architectural discussion.
results.impact_rationale: Technical analysis documents for orchestration pain points. No code changes, planning/architectural documentation.
results.urgency_rationale: Very recent (0.3 hours). Analysis/planning document. No immediate implementation. CI unstable.
results.quality_rationale: Comprehensive analysis (850 lines, 4 documents). Well-structured with recommendations. Draft appropriate for analysis.
